Class GuessingGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • GuessingGame
  • public class GuessingGame
extends java.lang.Object
    This program generates a random number between 1 and 100 for the user to guess and then returns whether the user's guess is higher or lower than the actual number
    Version:
    August 31 2022
    Author:
